overview: Dr. Shafique devotes the majority of clinical time treating lung cancer.
research_interests:
Dr. Shafique will primarily serves as PI on industry sponsored and cooperative group clinical trials in lung cancer. He collaborates with translational researchers at Moffitt and other outside cancer centers. As medical director at MIP, he is overseeing the expansion of interventional clinical trials at the Moffitt Ambulatory Clinic sites.
  *
